code:
local aura = C_UnitAuras.GetAuraDataBySpellName("player", "枯萎凋零","HELPFUL|PLAYER")
local remaining = 0
if aura then
    if aura.duration > 4 then
            -- 二段凋零+4秒
        remaining = aura.expirationTime - GetTime() + 4
    else
        remaining = aura.expirationTime - GetTime()
    end
    return math.max(remaining, 0)
else
    return remaining
end
